/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with bare trees, their branches reaching upwards towards the clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding to the serene atmosphere. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The overall mood of the image is peaceful and serene, as if inviting the viewer to take a moment and appreciate the beauty of the everyday.
